title: Town Hall Meeting Remarks
content: For release on delivery  Noon EST (10:00 a.m. MST)  November 10, 2011    Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     Town Hall Meeting with Soldiers and Their Families     Fort Bliss, Texas    November 10, 2011
